item.title: Ivanhoe Mines files NI 43-101 technical report on the Preliminary Economic Assessment for the Kakula Copper Discovery in the Democratic Republic of Congo
item.description: [Marketwired] - Ivanhoe Mines announced today that, further to its news release dated December 13, 2016, the company has filed a National Instrument 43-101 technical report on the Preliminary Economic Assessment for the ...
